Title: A Sword for a Life I
Text:
Threatened by Giles, a lackey of a brigand named Pierce, that he must provide him a sword or his family would be harmed, Lucious Warrer stole Thonrum's blade.

Thonrum Ironsword has agreed to forge a new blade for Lucious Warrer, but in exchange, Thonrum has given you three items to take to Lucious for him to repair. The dwarf said that if he likes Lucious’ work, he will call it even on the cost of the two swords he is having to make.

Lucious Warrer told you that Pierce, the brigand-captain, will kill his daughter, unless he gets a new sword. Lucious has asked you to retrieve the sword from Thonrum.
CompleteText:
Those accursed brigands took Warrer's daughter? This is bad. This sword isn't ready yet! And I know these types of fellows. They won't take "no" for an answer. They'll kill that girl!
You'll have to mount a rescue and free Lucious’ daughter! Hurry now!
NextQuestTitle: A Sword for a Life II
